comments.text:
Recently my Thunderbird has become almost useless as most images on e-mails appear as a broken gray page. I read it might be due to messages composed using Word/Outlook, but that response is useless if my mail becomes only partially functional.
I would hate to switch to Outlook, but currently I have to open the e-mail contents using "display as a web page" to see what I am getting.

If this comment is tied to the wrong ehtry, I would appreciate if you could please re-direct it so that I can follow the resolution of this *serious* problem.

P.S.- My version is 17.0.8 on Windows XP
